summary: A Vassal kills his lord and his wife with her cat commit suicide to avoid marrying him. Will they return and try to get revenge?
cast: Ryôhei Uchida|Kôtarô Satomi|Kyoko Mikage|Hiroshi Nawa|Yuriko Mishima|Machiko Yashiro|Tatsuo Matsumura|Ryûko Azuma|Mitsuko Yoshikawa|Bunta Sugawara|Kenji Kusumoto|Yôichi Numata|Masumi Tachibana|Hideto Kagawa|Misa Toki|Yasuko Ogura|Keiko Kojima|Tokuko Miura|Keiichiro Shimada|Chiyo Okada|Mie Hayashi|Kazutarô Kuni|Kinji Nakamura|Kin'ya Suzuki|Takayuki Akutagawa
title: Kaibyô nori no numa
